protocol.name: P-GSE42065-2
protocol.text: For each replicate, ten leaves were floated on a solution containing 0.1 % Tween 20 + 0.1 % acetone and maintained for 4 hours in growth room conditions. After 4 hours had elapsed tissue was harvested, flash frozen using liquid nitrogen and stored at -80 °C.

protocol.name: P-GSE42065-3
protocol.text: Seeds were chilled for 72 hours at 4 °C prior to sowing on F2 compost and maintaining in growth rooms set to a 16-hour day length, 20 °C.

protocol.name: P-GSE42065-4
protocol.text: Frozen tissue was ground to a fine powder in liquid nitrogen and total RNA extracted using the commercially available Rneasy mini kit (Qiagen).

protocol.name: P-GSE42065-5
protocol.text: Affymetrix Eukaryotic Sample Processing protocol followed - biotin labelling of antisense cRNA

protocol.name: P-GSE42065-6
protocol.text: Affymetrix Eukaryotic Sample Processing protocol followed - 16 hours at 45oC in rotating hybridisation oven

protocol.name: P-GSE42065-7
protocol.text: Affymetrix GeneChip Command Console Scan Control 1.1.0.845. Affymetrix 450 Scanner.

protocol.name: P-GSE42065-8
protocol.text: Affymetrix Expression Console software v1.1. MAS5.
